content: I need a workflow to process customer data
I'll create a basic workflow with a webhook trigger and data transformation job.
Can you change this to use a cron trigger that runs every hour?

{"text": "I'll modify the workflow to use a cron trigger that runs every hour instead of the webhook trigger.", "yaml": "name: customer-data-processing
jobs:
  transform-data:
    name: Transform Data
    adaptor: '@openfn/language-common@latest'
    body: '// Add operations here'
triggers:
  cron:
    type: cron
    cron_expression: '0 * * * *'
    enabled: false
edges:
  cron->transform-data:
    source_trigger: cron
    target_job: transform-data
    condition_type: always
    enabled: true"}
